title: Avengers: Endgame
description: After the devastating events of Infinity War, the Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.
cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces his greatest test when the Joker unleashes chaos upon Gotham City, challenging his sense of justice and morality.
cast: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart

title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
description: Doctor Strange embarks on a journey through the multiverse with new and old allies to confront a mysterious new adversary.
cast: Benedict Cumberbatch, Elizabeth Olsen, Chiwetel Ejiofor

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces his greatest test when the Joker unleashes chaos upon Gotham City, challenging his sense of justice and morality.
cast: Christian Bale, Heath Ledger, Aaron Eckhart

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
description: Jake Sully and Neytiri must protect their family from a returning threat, leading them to explore Pandora’s oceans.
cast: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver

title: Titanic
description: A young couple from different social backgrounds fall in love aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic.
cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet, Billy Zane

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: Peter Parker’s identity is revealed, forcing him to seek help from Doctor Strange, but things take a dangerous turn across universes.

title: Joker
description: A mentally troubled comedian embarks on a downward spiral that leads to the creation of an infamous criminal mastermind.
cast: Joaquin Phoenix, Robert De Niro, Zazie Beetz

title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
description: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their nation after the death of King T’Challa, facing new enemies and challenges.
cast: Letitia Wright, Angela Bassett, Tenoch Huerta
